channel.title: [Delta] - Interfaces

item.title: [Delta] - Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

So Im working on a new interface I made it with Lin’s interface MAKER, and everything is fine except for that 5 sprites (the actionbuttons) don’t load up when I put my mouse over top them In the top right corner of my client it sais there names it just doesnt display them. heres the example of one my addactionbutton things.

//Control 247 (3) intEnergyBlast.anIntArray240[4] = 247; intEnergyBlast.anIntArray241[4] = 51; intEnergyBlast.anIntArray272[4] = 17; //Button addActionButton(247, 247, 247, 28, 28, "EB 2 0"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text

So does anyone know why its not displaying them, again its just the action buttons the normal sprites it displays fine. Oh and I already have this

public static void addActionButton(int i, int j, int k, int width, int height, String s) { Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9(); class9.anInt250 = i; class9.anInt236 = i; class9.anInt262 = 5; class9.anInt217 = 1; class9.anInt214 = 0; class9.anInt220 = width; class9.anInt267 = height; class9.aByte254 = 0; class9.anInt230 = 52; class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(j, "custom"); class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(k, "custom"); class9.aString221 = s; }

incase you were wondering if that was the problem I dont think it is.

Read full topic
